name: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

name: Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

name: Lord of the Rings: The Return of The King
Description: After the battle in Helms Deep, the fellowship knows that is time for the last fight and now is time to face the Witch King in his kingdom

name: The Hobbit
Description: The beggining of the ring that rules over all story with Bilbo
